author: Kate T
comment: Great app, just one problem that is pretty big (to me, at least). Unless you completely disable all notifications for the app, it shows what you're listening to on the lock screen. This mean I also don't get notifications for when new episodes are released nor can I easily pull down the notification bar to pause a podcast.  Other than this, the app is great. It's simple to use, you can easily search for new podcasts and it reliably syncs across all devices

author: Heidi Bertels
comment: My favorite podcasting app. However, there's  recent changes I don't care for and would cause me to give it a poor rating.  . . . on my main playlist the podcasts are eliminated after they're played. Please allow me to clean up the playlists myself. I often return to the list for shownotes, to re-listen, etc. I dont seem to have that option now. I habe often hunted through long schedules of older casts to add them to my playlist. Now, if I want to return to the podcast on my playlist it is gone! Please return it back to how it was OR instruct me how to enable cleaning up the list myself.

author: Conor Appleton
comment: I use this app for at least 2 hours a day. I'm not sure what I'd be doing without it.  The previous version had an issue where the app would crash when re-ordering my "up next" podcasts, but this new version has fixed the problem.  Worth buying without a doubt. The devs really do care.

reply.author: Shifty Jelly
reply.content: Sorry to hear this. We haven't been able to reproduce this. Is it possible to send us an email from inside the app so we can look at your logs.

author: Vladimir D
comment: Satisfied user for over 2 years. However, the app has issues sending track info to car stereos over Bluetooth. No such issues with the following apps: Castbox, Podcast Republic, Podcast Player, Podcast Addict. Been waiting over 6 months for a fix.

author: Michael Rector
comment: I had to edit my review because it was old and needed to be 5 stars and I needed to say I absolutely love this app. Always read the app updates, because Shifty Jelly brings a little humor to them. Awesome app; two thumbs, five stars.

author: Oscar Obians
comment: I dare say it's the most beautiful podcast app as far as they go. However it's a bit light on features. I often feel the need to explore the episodes and descriptions available in a podcast feed and even listen to a couple before hitting the subscribe button.

author: Samuel Fehling
comment: This is hands down one of my favorite apps! It works like it should. My podcasts sync between my phone and tablet easily and the ability to cast podcasts to my Google Home speaker groups is amazing! On top of all the features, the app looks beautiful with its elegant material design and smooth animations. The developers are quick to issue updates and fixes. I highly recommend this app.

author: Bryce Zubriski
comment: I've used this app for years and have loved it but lately I've been experiencing a lot of pauses, hiccups, and skips. I thought maybe it just needed an update but I've had it fully updated for a while now and it's still happening.  If this issue gets fixed I'll be right back to a 5 star review.

author: Nils Linde
comment: Best podcast app I have used so far. But not having the option to set "New Releases" as the default startup screen is annoying.
Organization of episodes is annoying and cumbersome. It is difficult to keep played episodes easily accessible. I switched to another player.

author: Martin Leonard
comment: I was a long term user of Google Listen but since it has been dropped by Google I needed an alternative. Pocket Cast is worthy of the job and is an excellent podcast app from a great developer.

author: timothemad
comment: Awesome app. Just ignore the people who gave 1 🌟 reviews, I'll guarantee you 99% of them where dropped as babies.

author: Sean Dakin
comment: Hands down the best podcatcher available, and it only gets better with each update(which you should read because they're actually awesome!) Everything works like it should, it looks great and there's nothing you don't need mucking up the interface. Keep up the great work guys/gals.

author: Ronald Vargo
comment: Works great still have occasional issue where Android thinks I don't need to listen when the app is in the background and stops playing.

author: Terry Disz
comment: 5 Stars just because your latest update was hilarious. Great sense of humor. !! 2 exclamation points to show how serious this review is.

author: Jared Parker
comment: BEST PODCAST APP PERIOD!! Quick updates. Very funny change logs. You have a problem then answer an fix it quickly!

author: junyi Li
comment: best podcast app, love it.I suggest to add search episode function. I think its useful for make it better.

author: Josh Withers
comment: Latest update broke the widget. Love the new look, separating the days, great work, thanks

reply.author: Shifty Jelly
reply.content: Thanks for taking the time to report this, we'll look into what might be happening there and should have it fixed soon :)

author: Glen Crosby
comment: Bug Report: Unable to manually download unless plugged in after most recent update. The auto-download preference has seeped over to manual downloads.

author: Ken Ume
comment: Still my favourite podcast app. Head and shoulders above the rest. And a real sense of humour. If there's scope for improvement it might be in how it manages custom files for playback. But even so still a great app.

author: Manny Kim
comment: Old episodes are frustrating to look for because there are no scroll bars or episode searching.

author: Nicholas Rea
comment: Very intuitive interface and deep features that don't get in the way of casual use. Love that you can change the speed and volume of individual podcasts and have that as a setting.

author: John Kessler
comment: Great app. It has all the skip and back up options. Choose from 10 to 30 seconds or whatever you want. Stream, download, auto download. Great playlist and "up next" cue features.

author: David Raghavan
comment: Absolute favourite podcast app. Syncs podcasts across devices, just wish it did the same for episodes.
After trying a few podcasts apps (some paid), I found this to be one most close to perfection. Clean interface and simple options.

author: Jacopo Scannella
comment: Show older episodes button doesn't work.

author: Simcha Wood
comment: Been using the app for a while now and it is everything I wanted from a podcast app.  I particularly love how well it allows me to sync progress between devices.

author: Joe Williams
comment: Great podcast app; it's good looking and fun to use. I use it multiple times a day. Love the devs responsiveness and sense of humor.

author: Tim Comly
comment: Best podcast app. Top 5 of my most used apps. Your update notes are always on point.

author: Tim Petrowitsch
comment: Love the app. Always look forward to the update release notes too. Keep it up!

author: Vishnu Parammal
comment: Loved the interface and ease of operation. Lots of features that help listen and enjoy the podcast better.

author: Edward Furey
comment: Great podcast app, but I wish it had Android Wear support.

author: Lumi
comment: Great app. However, I'd love to have a shortcut to the Downloads tab.

author: Scott Bowers
comment: Best podcast app on Android along with the best patch notes in the biz!

reply.author: Shifty Jelly
reply.content: You might like to check out Tasker integration: http://www.shiftyjelly.com/support/pocketcasts/63 :)

author: Ewan S
comment: Issues fixed.

author: Tyler Morrow
comment: Great app and keeps getting better.

author: iffan majid
comment: Love the release notes! 😪

author: Jeff Mohr
comment: The best podcasting app

author: Zharzhan Kulmyrza
comment: Best podcasts player.
Best for podcasts.
